title: Castle Mountains National Monument: Camping
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping     Camping              Camping        Campgrounds Mid Hills Campground- Open. First come, first served only. Hole-in-the-Wall Campground- Open. October - November, and March - April are the busiest periods, when the campground may fill on weekends. First come, first served. Black Canyon Group and Equestrian Campground- Open. Reservations required; call 760-928-2572 for more information.
